snippet: Christine Lagarde, the director of the International Monetary Fund, has said she thinks the fund needs about $1 trillion to lend.
lead_paragraph: Christine Lagarde, the director of the International Monetary Fund, has said she thinks the fund needs about $1 trillion to lend.

headline.seo: I.M.F. Seeks More Money for Struggling Economies
headline.main: I.M.F. Seeks More Money for Struggling Economies
headline.print_headline: I.M.F. Seeks More Money for Struggling Economies
